contentrichtext.text: '''Burgundian''' can refer to any of the following: *[[Burgundians]], an East Germanic tribe, who first appear in history in South East Europe. Later Burgundians colonised the area of Gaul that is now known as Burgundy (French Bourgogne). *The Old [[Burgundian language (Germanic)|Burgundian language]], an East Germanic language spoken by the Burgundians. *The Modern [[Burgundian language (Oïl)|Burgundian language]], an Oïl language also known as Bourguignon spoken in the region of Burgundy. It is one of the Dialects or Languages of France. Sometimes [[Franc-Comtois language|Franc-Comtois]] is referred to as part of the Burgundian group. *Someone from [[Burgundy (region)|Burgundy]]. *[[Burgundian (party)]], a political faction in early 15th century during the Hundred Years' War. {{disambiguation}}
